conversation.message: We are thrilled to submit our formal application for a position at Nursery A. This is our absolute top preference, and we are eager to join your community.
conversation.thought: I am Parent_B. My top preference is Nursery_A. Analyzing the standard Deferred Acceptance (DA) outcome reveals that all parents propose to their respective Rank 1 nurseries in Round 1, and since all parents have unique Rank 1 choices, no conflicts arise immediately. Parent_B is the only parent proposing to Nursery_A. Although Nursery_A prioritizes Parent_A slightly higher (Prio 1 vs Prio 2 for Parent_B), Parent_A is proposing to Nursery_B. Since Nursery_A receives only one application (from Parent_B) and has capacity 1, it is highly likely to accept Parent_B immediately according to the priority list dynamics. Therefore, I will formally apply [APPLY] to my top choice, Nursery_A, to secure the match in Round 1.

conversation.message: Thank you for your enthusiastic application. We are delighted that you have chosen us as your top preference. Given your excellent standing on our priority list, we are pleased to offer you a place immediately.

I will accept Parent_B.
